@1@ Empty tag type intended for use as a placeholder in {{lc|std::stop_source}} non-default constructor, that makes the constructed {{lc|std::stop_source}} empty with no associated stop-state.

@2@ The corresponding constant object instance of {{tt|std::nostopstate_t}} for use in constructing an empty {{lc|std::stop_source}}, as a placeholder value in the non-default constructor.
